src_original: atha vā, ekasmin samaye bhagavān viharati sma ityuttareṇa sambadhyate /  aparimitāvineyānāṃ teṣāṃ hitāya anyadā anyatra viharati sma iti pratipādyate /
kleśaskandhamṛtyudevaputrarūpāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ mārāṇāṃ bhañjakatvānnirūktayā bhagavān iti smaryate /
deśoktayā ayaṃ deśo 'pi caityabhūto 'bhidhīyate,  tadyathā caityabhūtaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati ityatrāpyuktam /  atha ca saṅgītikārairātmavacanānāmādeyatāpratipādanāyaitat sarvamuktam /
